### *Black in Marine Science is a group of Black Marine Scientists and allies organising and coordinating an online event to engage all Black Marine Scientists and our supporters. We are planning an event called [#BlackInMarineScienceWeek](bimsw2020.html) scheduled for November 29- December 5, 2020.*
